sections.heading: Procedure.(a) The legal title to lands or to any tenements whereon entry can be made may be tried in a civil action, based upon a cause of action in ejectment
sections.text:
The action shall be begun by filing in the office of the prothonotary of the county in which the lands or tenements lie a complaint setting
